```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
sample_stats <- read.csv("data/sample_statistics.csv") 
sample_stats$Condition <- as.factor(sample_stats$Condition)
head(sample_stats)
```
```{r}
p <- filter(sample_stats, Condition == "HD") %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_density(aes(x=PMI, fill=Condition))
p
```
